metadata.title: CVE-2024-35789 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:mac80211: check/clear fast rx for non-4addr sta VLAN changes When moving astation out of a VLAN and deleting the VLAN afterwards, the fast_rx entrystill holds a pointer to the VLAN's netdev, which can cause use-after-freebugs. Fix this by immediately calling ieee80211_check_fast_rx after theVLAN change.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-35789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic-64k - 6.8.0-35.35
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1009-aws - 6.8.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-azure - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-gcp - 6.8.0-1008.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-gke - 6.8.0-1004.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-ibm - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-lowlatency - 6.8.0-35.35.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-35.35.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1005-raspi - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-oem - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-oracle package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
